name: Saints Row 2: Corporate Warfare
description: Corporate Warfare is the second downloadable content pack (DLC) for Saints Row 2. The DLC offers three new singleplayer missions in which the protagonist will work for Eric Gryphon, new CEO of Ultor Corporation. Eric has some trouble with ex-Saints gang member Dex who has betrayed the gang. The DLC also adds new vehicles, craft and character customization options.
